name: LiQuid Gaming Minecraft Server!
description:
How to join the server:
  •  Set your game version to 1.16.4 
  •  Join the server with IP: server2.liqgaming.com:7792

rules.title: Ender dragon is reserved for a scheduled event
Do not steal, ask before taking stuff
Admins reserve the right to remove you from the server for breaking these rules
Racist remarks and or symbols are forbidden
Be in the discord while playing
Lets keep our server looking nice, please replant trees when you cut down
Do not cause issues on the server
